name: OCKResponsiveLayout
desc: A configuration object for views, which contains layout information for different combinations of size class and content size categories.

items.name: init(defaultLayout: LayoutOption, anySizeClassRuleSet: [OCKResponsiveLayout<LayoutOption>.Rule<LayoutOption>], sizeClassSpecificRuleSets: [OCKResponsiveLayout<LayoutOption>.SizeClassRuleSet<LayoutOption>])
items.desc: Creates a new responsive layout object with default and specific size class rules.

items.name: let defaultRuleSet: OCKResponsiveLayout<LayoutOption>.SizeClassRuleSet<LayoutOption>
items.desc: A default set of rules your applies to interface elements for different content size categories when the UserInterfaceSizeClass is not important.

items.name: let sizeClassSpecificRuleSets: [OCKResponsiveLayout<LayoutOption>.SizeClassRuleSet<LayoutOption>]
items.desc: A set of rules that provide different accessible layouts for specific size class combinations.

items.name: struct OCKResponsiveLayout.Rule
items.desc: A layout rule for a specific content size category.

items.name: struct OCKResponsiveLayout.SizeClassRuleSet
items.desc: A set of rules for a given size class.

items.name: func responsiveLayoutRule(traitCollection: UITraitCollection) -> LayoutOption
items.desc: Returns a generic layout option you can compare with a given trait collection.
